nodes.text: Jolly Man was a freighter used by the New Jedi Order as part of the Wild Knights. It was used to transport their non-hyperdrive equipped ships (2 I-7 Howlrunners and 3 A-9 Vigilances).
It participated in the attempts to capture a yammosk at the Assault on Arkania, as Corran Horn's flagship at the Battle of Talfaglio, and at the Battle of Coruscant during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
